title: WTF is an Arpeggio?
description:
Let's learn about arpeggios and check out the Midicake Arp.
Get these things: 
Arp: https://www.midicake.com/product-page/midicake-arp
Roland SH 4d: https://shrsl.com/410d1
Arturia Keystep: https://shrsl.com/410d2
